PBA Dance Ensemble in South Korea
6 p.m. Saturday and Sunday, September 13–14 Shinjeongho Outdoor Concert Hall, A-san, South Korea Join us for a vibrant celebration of ethnic rhythms as the PBA Dance Ensemble takes the stage at the  International Ethnic Dance Festival in South Korea! Admission is free. Registration Link

Voices for Change Preaching Festival
Weyenberg Center at Palm Beach Atlantic University
Weyenberg Center, West Palm Beach, FL 33401, West Palm Beach, FL
Join us for Palm Beach Atlantic University's first annual Preaching Festival! Experience powerful messages from Dr. Matthew Kim (Baylor), Dr. Karen Reed (PBA), and PBA students, including multilingual preaching in English, Spanish, and Kreyol—with live translation available. The Preaching Festival will also feature a variety of breakout sessions conducted by seasoned experts, opportunities for local preachers […]

At Palm Beach Atlantic University, we believe our mission and vision should be expressed through our leaders. The University's leadership and president's office is composed of strong, compassionate, and visionary leaders of integrity in policy and planning, strategic communications and marketing, and administrative and financial operations who advance PBA’s mission of enlightening minds, enriching souls and extending hands.

PBA Night at the Ballpark
Roger Dean Stadium
4751 Main St, Jupiter, FL, United States
The entire PBA community and their families are invited to come out to the baseball game. Come join fellow Sailfish as we cheer on our local teams, eat delicious food and enjoy the night's theme: County Fair Night! Featuring carnival games, inflatables, a petting zoo, face painting and more. Register Here
